Affix.Name: Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods
Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods
Affix.Desc: After using an Elemental Skill, gain a 20% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s. While under a shield granted by the Crystallize reaction, the above effect will be increased by 150%, and this additional increase disappears 1s after that shield is lost.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Magnanimous Ink Bottle
EQUIP_RING.Desc: An ink bottle utilized by the witch in the story. It possesses a strange enchantment no less powerful than the one cast upon the dip pen.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Honest Quill
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: The witch in the tale used this dip pen. Among its various advantages, its silky-smooth writing is the least worthy of mention.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Compassionate Ladies' Hat
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: The lady's hat favored by the witch in the story. She loved this piece of headwear for how it weaves together solemnity and playfulness.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Selfless Floral Accessory
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A brooch that the witch in the tale wore. As with the other ornaments she loved, this was characterized by butterfly-like shapes.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Faithful Hourglass
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A sand timepiece that the witch relied on in the story. Legend has it that if you recite the wrong incantation over it, time will suddenly flow exceptionally quickly.
